value.title: Tip: Change Title Text Dynamically in Power BI Visual
value.excerpt: This is a Quick Tip Video in the Power BI. Sometimes we have a requirement in which we need to set the Title of the visual based on some conditions. This video will help you to achieve that thing. We can easily apply the Conditional Formatting for Visual Headers.
